title: Screenprint, "Design for Textile-Victoriana", 1942
medium: Pink, blue and orange ink; black colored pencil on cream wove paper
signed: Lower right in black colored pencil: VICTORIANA 1942/ Sandro Girard/1942
inscribed: In pencil at upper right edge: 118 yards
provenance: From the office of Alexander H. Girard
description: Various motifs: Hand with bouquet of flowers; high buttoned shoe; mask; heart-shaped locket with ribbon; bird with letter; fan; butterfly; shell; ring.

tombstone.epitaph: Screenprint, "Design for Textile-Victoriana", 1942.Pink, blue and orange ink; black colored pencil on cream wove paper. Gift of Alexander H. Girard. 1969-165-185.
